definition.name: NXdetector
definition.doc:
Template of a detector, detector bank, or multidetector. The indices require explanation: np - the number of points in a scan. This dimension is only present in scanning measurements. tof - the number of points in a time-of-flight axis. This is only present in time-of-flight measurements. i - the number of pixels in the slowest varying direction. This is only present in missing in the point detector. j - the number of pixels in the fastest varying direction. This exists only in "area" detectors.
